title: Secure User Authentication with Multi-Factor Login
summary: Develop a secure login system with multi-factor authentication for customer access.
description: Implement a secure authentication module allowing users to log in using multi-factor authentication, enhancing the protection of sensitive financial data. Include password recovery, session timeout handling, and device recognition features to ensure trust and convenience. This epic provides the foundation for secure access to the self-service portal.

title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface
summary: Design a responsive, modern, and accessible UI for the portal across devices.
description: Develop an adaptable user interface that maintains consistency and usability across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Focus on accessibility, modern design aesthetics, and intuitive navigation to create a frictionless experience for all users. The interface should provide a unified brand experience while adhering to usability standards.

title: Personalized Dashboard and Product Eligibility Display
summary: Create a personalized dashboard showing products and services based on user profile.
description: Design and implement a dynamic dashboard that provides customers with real-time information about their accounts, products, and eligibility for new services. The dashboard should integrate user data to display relevant offers, account summaries, and quick access points for frequently used features, ensuring a tailored experience for each user.

title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Enable users to initiate and modify service requests through efficient workflows.
description: Develop guided workflows for opening new accounts, changing account preferences, and modifying banking services. Optimize flow efficiency by reducing the number of required steps and incorporating dynamic validations. Ensure smooth integration with the backend systems for timely processing of requests.

title: Request Tracking and Notification System
summary: Implement real-time tracking and notifications for user-submitted requests.
description: Create a subsystem that keeps customers informed about the status of their service requests in real time. Include automated notifications sent via email or portal alerts when requests are received, approved, or completed. The feature should enhance transparency and reduce the need for follow-up calls or visits.

title: Document Upload and Application Continuation Feature
summary: Allow document submissions and enable saving and resuming of incomplete applications.
description: Implement a secure document upload feature supporting multiple file formats and size validations. Enable users to save partially completed applications and resume them later, ensuring convenience and reducing abandonment rates. The document upload process must include scanning, encryption, and secure storage policies aligned with data protection standards.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the portal seamlessly with the existing core banking systems.
description: Establish secure, real-time integration between the self-service portal and the bankâ€™s core systems. Implement APIs and data synchronization to manage account information, product configurations, and transaction data. The integration must ensure data consistency and minimal latency while maintaining the reliability of both systems.

title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization Framework
summary: Implement a robust RBAC system to regulate feature access per user role.
description: Design a comprehensive role-based access control framework that limits access based on user roles and authorization levels. Ensure customers, support staff, and administrators have appropriate levels of visibility and permissions. Include audit capabilities to track and log permission changes and access activity.

title: Data Security, Privacy Compliance, and Audit Trails
summary: Enforce stringent data security measures and maintain activity audit trails.
description: Implement encryption for all stored and transmitted financial data while ensuring compliance with applicable data protection standards and financial regulations. Include intrusion detection, anomaly monitoring, and extensive audit logging to trace user and system actions, thus ensuring complete transparency and accountability.

title: Customer Interaction History and Reporting
summary: Provide comprehensive recordkeeping and reporting of all user interactions.
description: Develop a module that captures and archives all user interactions and transactions within the portal. Allow customers to view their complete interaction history, while providing administrative and compliance teams with analytical and reporting features. Ensure accessibility and data integrity through effective indexing and retrieval mechanisms.
